## Set up Chunk

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(lterdatasampler)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
data(pie_crab)
```

# Exploratoy Visualization
```{r}
ggplot(data = pie_crab, 
       aes(x=latitude, y=size, color=site))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_color_viridis(discrete=T, option='plasma')
```
